ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Auditory Processing Disorder (APD) / Generalized Neurological Pathway Disorder
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: APD battery confirmed significant abnormalities in auditory figure-ground, dichotic listening, and temporal processing consistent with a neurological basis.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Auditory Neuropathy Spectrum Disorder (ANSD)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: History of abnormal ABR with present OAEs and elevated reflexes, though considered part of the broader neurological deficits.

ordered_list.rationale_short: Review baseline hearing sensitivity and word recognition ability.
Review neural integrity via OAEs, ARTs, and ABR to investigate auditory neuropathy.
Assess speech recognition performance in background noise.
Comprehensive assessment of central auditory processing skills.
Assess dichotic listening and integration abilities.
Assess dichotic listening with low linguistic load.

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: Peripheral hearing sensitivity is normal, but physiologic testing indicates auditory neuropathy spectrum characteristics (present OAEs, abnormal ABR). Behavioral APD testing reveals severe deficits in auditory figure-ground, dichotic listening, and temporal processing, with a composite score in the 2nd percentile. A significant Left Ear Advantage (LEA) on multiple tests suggests atypical language processing organization.

tests.name: Pure-tone and Speech Audiometry (External Review)
tests.result_summary: Hearing within normal limits bilaterally; Word Recognition Scores (WRS) 100%.

tests.name: Physiologic Measures (External Review)
tests.result_summary: OAEs present; ARTs elevated; reflex decay present bilaterally; ABR abnormal (90 dB nHL required for repeatable response).

tests.name: BKB-SIN Test
tests.result_summary: SNR loss of 8.5 dB, indicating moderate difficulty understanding sentences in noise.

tests.name: SCAN-3A (APD Battery)
tests.result_summary: Composite score 69 (2nd percentile). Core subtests ranged 1st-25th percentile. Time Compressed Sentences (53rd percentile) was normal. Left Ear Advantage noted on multiple subtests.

tests.name: Staggered Spondee Word Test (SSW)
tests.result_summary: Total errors 21 (norm 1.61). All conditions substantially poorer than cutoff. Left Ear Advantage observed in competing conditions.

tests.name: Dichotic Digits Test (DDT)
tests.result_summary: Right Ear 65%, Left Ear 55%. Scores well below cutoff. Right Ear Advantage of 10% observed.

proposed_items: Continue use of compensatory strategies (self-pacing, quiet environments, strict organization)
Monitor for developing technology that may assist in the future
Use of visual cues and context to support auditory information
counseling_actions: Explain the neurological basis of deficits related to intrauterine drug exposure
Discuss the Left Ear Advantage findings indicating atypical brain organization for language
Validate the patient's success and intellectual ability despite sensory/cognitive factors
Advise that specific remediation/training is unlikely to change physiological status; compensatory strategies are the best option

escalation.rationale_short: Patient has developed effective compensatory strategies; no specific medical or surgical intervention is indicated for the APD/neurological findings.

follow_up_plan.objective: Monitor for new assistive technology and maintain compensatory strategies.

expected_outcome: Patient has earned a doctorate and maintains a successful personal and professional life.
Patient continues to use intellectual gifts and determination to overcome multiple factors that might have prevented academic and personal success.
